𒉻 = 𒌋𒐼

𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𒐼 𒀸𒐼 𒃻 𒋩 𒉻 𒃻 𓆰 šar GAR grass 𒊸 SHAR 𒊺 SHE 𒉻 ŠUK

𒉻 ŠUK •Sukkulenten Zeug 𓆰
𒉻 PAD paṭ phyto plant
𒉻 PAD paṭ part break, pierce into bits
𒉻 PAD paṭ pot in 𒋼𒀀𒉻 𒋤𒊑 kar-pat ser-ri "a type of pot"
𒉻 PAD paṭ "portion"
𒉻 PAD šukur₂ food security "food allocation, ration" 𒉻 ŠUK šukur₂

𒉻 PAD ≈ bed in 𒌫𒉻 ur₂pad bedroom #urpatu

𒉻 kurum₆ Krume #kurummatu "food ration" 𓄯

PAD 𒉻 bite
PAD (ŠUK) 𒉻 vs asSUR 𒃻 succulent?
